shadow="0"><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="5" value="<font style="font-size: 32px;">$$ ∣ψ(0)⟩&nbsp;=&nbsp; &nbsp; ∣ 0 ; 0 , 0 ; 1 , 1 ⟩ $$</font>" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="6" value="<font style="font-size: 21px;">Ejemplo: Negación de un Input de 2 bits</font>" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="7" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;rotation=90;size=0.5;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="369" y="239" width="20" height="53" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="8" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;rotation=90;size=0.5;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="298" y="239" width="20" height="53" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="9" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;rotation=90;size=0.5;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="244" y="252" width="20" height="26" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="10" value="<font style="font-size: 32px;">$$\hat x$$</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="169" y="209" width="167" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="11" value="<font style="font-size: 32px;">$$\hat n$$</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="222" y="209" width="169" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="12" value="<font style="font-size: 32px;">$$\hat m$$</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="291" y="208" width="178" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="13" value="<font style="font-size: 21px;">Los subespacios relevantes del sistema son:</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="73" y="362" width="435" height="37" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="14" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">\( \mathscr{H}_{x} \) : Espacio infinito dimensional del puntero (\(&nbsp;∣0⟩, ∣1⟩, ∣2⟩, ...&nbsp;\))</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="2" y="435" width="739" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="15" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">\( \mathscr{H}_{p} =&nbsp; \mathscr{H}_{halt} \bigotimes \mathscr{H}_{proc} \)&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; donde,</font><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 20px;">&nbsp;</span>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="79" y="501" width="776" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="16" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">\( \mathscr{H}_{proc}\)&nbsp; &nbsp;: Espacio 2 dimensional que maneja la transicion de estados de la maquina</font><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 20px;">&nbsp;</span>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="119" y="623" width="906" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="17" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">\( \mathscr{H}_{halt}\)&nbsp; &nbsp;: Espacio 2 dimensional que indica el fin del computo</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="119" y="563" width="696" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="18" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">\( \mathscr{H}_{m} \)&nbsp; &nbsp; : Espacio \(2^n \) dimensional donde se ubica el input de tamaño \(n\), en este caso \(n=2\)</font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="79" y="681" width="1024" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="19" value="<font style="font-size: 24px;">Paso 1:</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="72" y="783" width="99" height="41" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="20" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">Estado inicial: \(&nbsp; ∣ψ(0)⟩ =&nbsp; &nbsp; ∣ x = 0 ⟩&nbsp;\bigotimes ∣ n_0 = 0 , n_1 = 0 ⟩ \bigotimes ∣ m_0 = 1, m_1 = 1 ⟩&nbsp;\)</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="8" y="844" width="908" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="21" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">a \(x\) le aplicamos el operador Shift: \( T: \;\;\;∣ x ⟩ \mapsto&nbsp;∣ x +1 ⟩&nbsp;&nbsp;\)</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="67" y="910" width="623" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="22" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">a \(m_0\) le aplicamos el operador NOT =&nbsp;</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="105" y="962" width="392" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="23" value="$$ \begin{pmatrix}<br>0 &amp; 1 \\<br>1 &amp; 0&nbsp;<br>\end{pmatrix} $$" style="text;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=22;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="422" y="938" width="195" height="118" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="24" value="<font>Para el procesador, necesitamos pasar desde \( ∣ n_0 = 0, n_1 = 0 ⟩&nbsp;\) a \( ∣ n_0 = 0, n_1 = 1 ⟩&nbsp;\)&nbsp;</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="81" y="1047" width="869" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="25" value="<font style="font-size: 24px;">Paso 2:</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="74" y="1171" width="99" height="41" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="26" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">Estado inicial: \(&nbsp; ∣ψ(1)⟩ =&nbsp; &nbsp; ∣ x = 1 ⟩&nbsp;\bigotimes ∣ n_0 = 0 , n_1 = 1 ⟩ \bigotimes ∣ m_0 = 0, m_1 = 1 ⟩&nbsp;\)</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="10" y="1232" width="908" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="27" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">a \(x\) le aplicamos el operador Shift: \( T: \;\;\;∣ x ⟩ \mapsto&nbsp;∣ x +1 ⟩&nbsp;&nbsp;\)</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="69" y="1298" width="623" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="28" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">a \(m_1\) le aplicamos el operador NOT =&nbsp;</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="107" y="1350" width="392" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="29" value="$$ \begin{pmatrix}<br>0 &amp; 1 \\<br>1 &amp; 0&nbsp;<br>\end{pmatrix} $$" style="text;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=22;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="424" y="1326" width="195" height="118" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="30" value="<font>Para el procesador, necesitamos pasar desde \( ∣ n_0 = 0, n_1 = 1 ⟩&nbsp;\) a \( ∣ n_0 = 1, n_1 = 1 ⟩&nbsp;\)&nbsp;</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="83" y="1435" width="869" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="31" value="<font style="font-size: 24px;">Paso 3:</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="78" y="1520" width="99" height="41" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="32" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">Estado inicial: \(&nbsp; ∣ψ(2)⟩ =&nbsp; &nbsp; ∣ x = 2 ⟩&nbsp;\bigotimes ∣ n_0 = 1 , n_1 = 1 ⟩ \bigotimes ∣ m_0 = 0, m_1 = 0 ⟩&nbsp;\)</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="14" y="1581" width="908" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="33" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="34" edge="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="495" y="1626" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="34" value="Fin del computo&nbsp;" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="412" y="1709" width="166" height="36" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 177px; margin-left: 247px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.font: Ejemplo: Negación de un Input de 2 bits

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Los subespacios relevantes del sistema son:

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 338px; margin-left: 370px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: \( \mathscr{H}_{x} \) : Espacio infinito dimensional del puntero (\( ∣0⟩, ∣1⟩, ∣2⟩, ... \))

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 404px; margin-left: 79px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: \( \mathscr{H}_{p} = \mathscr{H}_{halt} \bigotimes \mathscr{H}_{proc} \) donde,

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 20px;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 526px; margin-left: 119px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: \( \mathscr{H}_{proc}\) : Espacio 2 dimensional que maneja la transicion de estados de la maquina

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 20px;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 466px; margin-left: 119px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: \( \mathscr{H}_{halt}\) : Espacio 2 dimensional que indica el fin del computo

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 584px; margin-left: 79px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: \( \mathscr{H}_{m} \) : Espacio \(2^n \) dimensional donde se ubica el input de tamaño \(n\), en este caso \(n=2\)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 689px; margin-left: 120px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Paso 1:

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 747px; margin-left: 460px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Estado inicial: \( ∣ψ(0)⟩ = ∣ x = 0 ⟩ \bigotimes ∣ n_0 = 0 , n_1 = 0 ⟩ \bigotimes ∣ m_0 = 1, m_1 = 1 ⟩ \)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 813px; margin-left: 377px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: a \(x\) le aplicamos el operador Shift: \( T: \;\;\;∣ x ⟩ \mapsto ∣ x +1 ⟩ \)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 865px; margin-left: 299px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: a \(m_0\) le aplicamos el operador NOT =

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 882px; margin-left: 518px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 22px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 950px; margin-left: 514px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Para el procesador, necesitamos pasar desde \( ∣ n_0 = 0, n_1 = 0 ⟩ \) a \( ∣ n_0 = 0, n_1 = 1 ⟩ \)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1077px; margin-left: 122px;

div.font: Estado inicial: \( ∣ψ(1)⟩ = ∣ x = 1 ⟩ \bigotimes ∣ n_0 = 0 , n_1 = 1 ⟩ \bigotimes ∣ m_0 = 0, m_1 = 1 ⟩ \)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1612px; margin-left: 493px;
